text_Original: I've always been amazed at the amount of criticism the metaverse receives. Personally, I find it admirable that there are companies in the market investing in and believing in this technology. This innovation brings us closer to a future where human interaction transcends physical boundaries, allowing us to experience a virtual reality we've dreamt of since ancient times and portrayed in science fiction. I have high hopes that this project will continue to grow and strengthen as the years go by.
